hooks.command: if [[ '{tool_input.file_path}' == */backend/app/*.py ]]; then cd backend && ruff format '{tool_input.file_path}' && ruff check '{tool_input.file_path}' --output-format=concise; fi

if [[ '{tool_input.file_path}' == */frontend/src/*.ts* ]] || [[ '{tool_input.file_path}' == */frontend/tests/*.ts* ]]; then cd frontend && npx @biomejs/biome format --write '{tool_input.file_path}' && npx @biomejs/biome lint '{tool_input.file_path}'; fi
